classifier for a ream of paper

sentences.english: This means no more re-typing the password as you would normally do on the command line.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着不需要像平时一样在命令行上重复输入密码。

sentences.english: When working in a batch, we set all the parameters from the command line.
sentences.chinese: 当以批处理方式工作时，我们从命令行设置所有参数。

sentences.english: Run it again every time you open a new command-line window.
sentences.chinese: 每次打开新的命令行窗口时都要重新运行它。

sentences.english: These two methods provide the ability to apply fixpacks using the command line interface.
sentences.chinese: 这两个方法提供了通过命令行接口应用补丁包的能力。

sentences.english: Invoke the file from a command line, or click it depending on your operating system. The script putters around for a while before outputting something like this
sentences.chinese: 从命令行调用文件，或者根据操作系统单击文件。

sentences.english: We'll use a password file command-line option in the script.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在脚本中使用一个密码文件命令行选项。

sentences.english: The command line options will override the choices made in the GUI.
sentences.chinese: 这些命令行选项将会盖掉您原来在图形介面下的选项。

sentences.english: Rails makes extensive use of command line scripts.
sentences.chinese: Rails大量使用了命令行脚本。

sentences.english: Configuration of NdisWrapper is command line intensive.
sentences.chinese: 的配置是增强型命令行。

sentences.english: Now open this file with whichever command line editor you're most comfortable with.
sentences.chinese: 现在用一款你用着最顺手的命令行编辑器打开此文件。

sentences.english: This section examines two techniques for running a script from the command line.
sentences.chinese: 本节介绍从命令行运行脚本的两种方法。

sentences.english: Some of the programs in the tutorial require command-line arguments to run.
sentences.chinese: 教程中的一些程序需要命令行参数才能运行。

sentences.english: You can also use the command line to find out the size for a particular file format.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以使用此命令行来找到某特定文件格式的大小。

sentences.english: Consider the basic problem of writing a command-line script for performance monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 设想一个编写命令行脚本进行性能监控的简单问题。

sentences.english: This section explains how to automate resource management using command line scripts.
sentences.chinese: 本节解释如何使用命令行脚本自动化资源管理。
